info.description: This is an API for managing expenses.
info.title: Expense Tracker API

post.description: Create a new category with the provided details

parameters.description: Request body to create a new category
parameters.name: request

get.description: Retrieve all categories for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all categories

get.description: Get details of a category by its ID
get.summary: Get category details

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

patch.description: Update details of an existing category

parameters.description: Request body to update a category
parameters.name: request

get.description: Retrieve all expenses for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all expenses

get.description: Retrieves the list of months and years for which expense data is available for a user
get.summary: Get available months and years

get.description: Retrieves the expenses of a user categorized by category for a specified date range
get.summary: Get expenses by category for a period

400.description: Bad Request - Missing start date or end date

get.description: Retrieves the monthly expenses of a user categorized by category for a specific year
get.summary: Get monthly expenses by category for a specific year

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid year

get.description: A date range is passed to return a set of expenses in that range
get.summary: Get expenses in a time interval

get.description: Retrieves the total expenses of a user for the current month
get.summary: Get total expenses for the current month

get.description: Retrieves expenses of a user for a specific month and year
get.summary: Get expenses by month and year

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters

get.description: A date range is passed to return a set of expenses in that range
get.summary: Get tags in a time interval

parameters.description: Year for which to retrieve expenses
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Month for which to retrieve expenses
parameters.name: month

get.description: Retrieves the monthly expenses of a user categorized by tags for a specific year
get.summary: Get monthly expenses by tag for a specific year

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid year

get.description: Retrieves the total expenses by category tags for a given month and year for a user
get.summary: Get totals of expenses by category tags for a specific month and year

parameters.description: Year for which to retrieve expenses by category tags
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Month for which to retrieve expenses by category tags
parameters.name: month

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid year/month

get.description: Retrieves the total expenses of a user for a specified date range
get.summary: Get total expenses for a period

400.description: Bad Request - Missing start date or end date

get.description: Retrieves the total expenses for each month of the specified year for a user
get.summary: Get total expenses for each month in the specified year

parameters.description: Year for which to retrieve monthly expenses
parameters.name: year

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid year

get.description: Retrieves the total expenses of a user for the current week
get.summary: Get total expenses for the current week

get.description: Retrieve an expense by its ID
get.summary: Get a specific expense

delete.description: Delete an expense by its ID

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token
Registers a new user in the system

get.description: Retrieve all tags for the authenticated user
get.summary: Get all tags

post.description: Create a tag with a name and color

get.description: Retrieve a tag by its ID
get.summary: Get a tag by ID

put.description: Update a tag's name and color by its ID

delete.description: Delete a specific tag by its ID

get.description: Retrieves the details of a user by their user_id
get.summary: Get a user by ID

delete.description: Deletes a specific user by their user_id

patch.description: Updates details of a specific user

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users
get.summary: Get all users
